main.name: Nirajan Mahara
main.description: FullStack JavaScript Developer by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night
main.bio: Hi there! I am Nirajan! You can also call me Ninja.JS. I've been coding for over 10 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Currently I'm working with small business and startups, especially in the E-Commerce sector. If your business is in need of a web presence or an online store, feel free to reach out and we can see what kind of value I can bring your business. Along the journey I realized my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. Following the passion, I have started my own YouTube channel for programmers, where i teach to build many live projects.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: "Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect & passion in their operation."

testimonials.text: Talk is cheap, Show me the code.
Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
In some ways, programming is like painting. You start with a blank canvas and certain basic raw materials. You use a combination of science, art, and craft to determine what to do with them.
